What is the difference between an asylum seeker and a refugee? What is an illegal migrant?

John 2 hours ago

Ask your own question

Post your question to the community of interest

Ask a question

2 Answers

1

Migration status can be confusing, and getting the terms right is important as it affects healthcare entitlement. The section on immigration status provides clarity on this.

9 hours ago
1

There is no difference between asylum seeker and refugee status. Any illegal migrant is anyone else.

9 hours ago
